metadata.description: It’s been four years since Yuya Tsuda’s seen his childhood friend who moved overseas， Ryoichi Sakura. But Ryoichi’s sudden confession of love sends him into a crazy panic! What’s going to happen next......!? Find out in these two astonishing cover-story chapters and brand new extra comic. Also featuring three other stories， this is Hazuki Yuki’s first ever BOYS’ LOVE compilation!
metadata.name: Apples and The Beast (Yaoi Manga)
